page.title: 12MID-SUSSEX EMPLOYMENT (4)
page.content: The{Rock Lodge Vineyard}has three and a half acres.When they expand it will have up to 7 acres.As birds are not allowed to be shot in England nets are put over the vines.This takes a week.They use grafted vines because these are protected against Floxora.It takes 3 years for a seedling to produce a lot of fruit.The vineyard have won 2 silver awards and one bronze from the English wine of the year competition.There are now 250 vineyards in England.The greatest danger to a harvest is rabbits and at the end,a wet month.The vines are planted 5ft apart.When they collect in the grapes they hire 12 people to gather them in.After this they measure how many tons of grapes they have.Then they are crushed and left for 30 minutes.All the sludge is liquidised and put into a small container.
